fullName.description: Full name of the enterprise attribute

maxLength.description: Max Length of the enterprise attribute (0 - no limit)

defaultValue.description: Default value of the enterprise attribute

multiValuated.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute is multi-valuated

multiLine.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute is multi-line

hasAuthValues.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute has authorized values

listOfAuthValues.description: List of authorized values in strings

resetWhenDuplicate.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute is reset when duplicated

resetWhenRevision.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute is reset when revisioned

preferredUnit.description: Preferred unit of the enterprise attribute

indexed.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute is indexed

mandatory.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute is mandatory

readOnly.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute is read-only

exportIn3DXML.description: Boolean value of whether the enterprise attribute is exported in 3DMXL
